english.segment1: Jesus, I stand for You. No matter what You lead me through. They will chase me out. And close me down. But Jesus I'll stand for You
english.segment2: I'll always stand. I'll always stand. I'll always stand for You (X2)
english.segment3: Jesus, I've stood my ground. When unbelief was all around. I have failed the sting. Rejection brings. But Jesus I still stand for You
english.segment4: I'll always stand. I'll always stand. I'll always stand for You (X2)
english.segment5: A time will come. When everyone. Will turn there eyes. On the Risen Son. But until that day, this world will turn away. And so I'll take Your hand - I'll always stand for You
english.segment6: Guilty of this grace. But You took my place. So Jesus, I'll always stand for You
english.segment7: I'll always stand. I'll always stand. I'll always stand for You (X2)
